definition: plausible glib talk (especially useful to a salesperson), make light, rapid and repeated sounds
details:
noun
- plausible glib talk (especially useful to a salesperson)
= synonyms: spiel
- a quick succession of light rapid sounds
= example: a quick succession of light rapid sounds
verb
- make light, rapid and repeated sounds
= example: make light, rapid and repeated sounds
= synonyms: pitter-patter
- rain gently
= synonyms: spit
